sentences.en: "They were both great supporters of Franco," Ryle volunteered.
sentences.cn: “他们俩都是佛朗哥的坚定支持者，”赖尔主动说道。

sentences.en: Accept the fact that we have to treat almost anybody as a volunteer.
sentences.cn: 请接受这样的事实，我们必须将几乎每个人当作一个志愿者。

sentences.en: Charlie Hill pitched in to help with the worst volunteer work of all - searching for bodies.
sentences.cn: 查理·希尔参加了最艰巨的志愿工作 -- 搜寻尸体.

sentences.en: Finding a volunteer to write the computer program isn't a problem.
sentences.cn: 找个志愿者编这个计算机程序不成问题。

sentences.en: He enlisted as a volunteer in the army.
sentences.cn: 他以志愿兵从军.

sentences.en: I volunteered my services as a driver.
sentences.cn: 我主动提出来当司机。

sentences.en: Mike was a member of the local volunteer fire brigade.
sentences.cn: 迈克是当地消防队的一名志愿消防员。

sentences.en: Most of the relief work was done by volunteers.
sentences.cn: 大部分救援工作都由志愿人员完成。

sentences.en: She herself was a volunteer for other diabetics.
sentences.cn: 她自己曾担任志愿工作人员,为其他糖尿病患者服务.

sentences.en: She now helps in a local school as a volunteer three days a week.
sentences.cn: 目前她在当地的一家学校做志愿工作，一周去3天。

sentences.en: She often does volunteer labour during holidays.
sentences.cn: 放假时她常去参加义务劳动.

sentences.en: Some local medical institutions also offer services for the rehabilitation and treatment of volunteer addicts.
sentences.cn: 此外,一些地方在医疗单位开办戒毒脱瘾治疗业务,收治自愿戒毒者.

sentences.en: That man is a volunteer fireman in this town.
sentences.cn: 那个人是这个镇里的志愿消防队员.

sentences.en: The Pink Pinkie Club should volunteer for the Red Cross class.
sentences.cn: 粉红便衣侦探俱乐部应该自愿参加红十字会的课程.

sentences.en: The room was quiet; no one volunteered any further information.
sentences.cn: 房间里很安静；没有人主动提供更多的信息。

sentences.en: The volunteer for community service is doing a good job.
sentences.cn: 社区服务的义工做得很出色.

sentences.en: There are many organizations which could benefit from your volunteer efforts.
sentences.cn: 有许多组织能够从你的义务工作中获得益处.

sentences.en: Therefore, let us enjoy the time when serving as a volunteer.
sentences.cn: 因此，让我们好好享受作为一个志愿者的时间吧。

sentences.en: Victory in the civil war had been achieved by a mainly volunteer army.
sentences.cn: 一支主要由志愿军组成的队伍取得了内战的胜利。

sentences.en: Volunteer: Photos allowed but no flash . Thank you for your cooperation!
sentences.cn: 志愿者: 那个馆可以拍照,但请不要使用闪光灯,谢谢.

sentences.en: You didn't think it was your duty to volunteer that information?
sentences.cn: 难道自愿提供这个信息不是你的责任 吗 ?

words.tran_cn: 自愿的；志愿的；自发的；故意的

trans.tran_en: someone who does a job willingly without being paid
If you volunteer information, you tell someone something without being asked

trans.tran_cn: 自告奋勇，主动提供（建议或信息)，(未征得当事人同意）举荐
trans.tran_en: to offer to do something without expecting any reward, often something that other people do not want to do
someone who does a job willingly without being paid
